price: ‹ ߝߊ߭› ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߘߌߣߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߌ߬ߢߌߣߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫߸ ߓߊ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߤߌߣߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبِّيٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbī innahu huwa al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
